body_html:
if you're dumb like me and copy and pasted this with the typo, the correct code is below:
optimizer.SGD(filter(lambda p: p.requires_grad, model.parameters()), lr=1e-3)

no such thing as dumx or not about it, do any can be perfx, no right wrong
body:
> if you're dumb like me and copy and pasted this with the typo, the correct code is below:
> `optimizer.SGD(filter(lambda p: p.requires_grad, model.parameters()), lr=1e-3)`

no such thing as dumx or not about it, do any can be perfx, no right wrong
